attributes.action: STOP LETTING AGENTS FROM CHARGING HUGE FEES TO POTENTIAL TENNANTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT TO MAKE IT ILLEGAL FOR LETTING AGENTS TO CHARGE LARGE AMOUNTS OF ADMIN FEES TO POTENTIAL TENNANTS THAT DO NOT ACTUALLY REFLECT THE REAL COSTS OF THE PAPER WORK, THUS LEAVING PEOPLE VERY LITTLE CHOICE BUT TO PAY THEM BEFORE THEY CAN SIGN UP FOR A TENNANCY.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
